Comment.val: /* Program to query, delete/reset or set extra settings for the Multi Currency Spending Limit. */
/* pi-Action: Values: Q=Query M=Modify or Create and Modify, D=Delete=Reset. */

Text.val: When the record does not exist and the program is executed in Modify Mode --> create new record (separte task)
When the record does not exist and the program is executed in Modify Mode --> create new record:

Text.valUnicode: Geldsaldo. Waarvan geblokkeerd. Waarvan in betalingsopdrachten

ExpSyntax.val: 'Alles is op Ja gezet. Beter is het om te kiezen voor instelling "Uit" bij Multi Currency Best.ruimte in het vorige scherm.'
